article_title: Al Bruce: Move to Cape Breton if Trump Wins?

article_metadata.description: Some people think escaping from the good old U.S. of A. is less than theoretical, after Donald Trump won most of the Republican presidential primaries and caucuses on Super Tuesday. The notion of the former reality-television star taking the oath of office in January apparently prompted a surge in Google searches for the phrase “How to move to Canada.” In fact, Google reports that the phrase got 350 percent more popular as the Tuesday evening debate continued.But that’s
